>>> import svgwrite
>>> import GraphAssembly as Asb
>>> EGFR = Asb.GraphAssemble("test_1125.svg")
>>> EGFR.AddMolecule()
>>> KnownMut = [50,100,125,195,400]
>>> KnownMod = [75,110,125,295,600]
>>> PepInterval = [[1,20],[25,48], [70,105],[400,600]]
>>> EGFR.AddTicks(KnownMut,"circle")
>>> EGFR.PrintFigure()
>>> EGFR.AddTicks(KnownMod,"triangle")






PepInterval = [[1,20],[25,48],[15,55], [80,100],[25,48],[70,90],[400,600]]
import GraphCalculation as calc
calc.calCulatePeptideCoverage(PepInterval)
